subject: Officiating (Sports)
Gambling
Basketball
lead_paragraph: James Battista, a gambler, says he and Tim Donaghy bet on 47 N.B.A. games, 31 more than Donaghy acknowledged in a plea bargain.
snippet: James Battista, a gambler, says he and Tim Donaghy bet on 47 N.B.A. games, 31 more than Donaghy acknowledged in a plea bargain.
